articles.author: Justin Jackson
articles.title: Meta-analysis finds vegetarian diets effective in lowering cholesterol, glucose and weight - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Sydney, Australia, have conducted a metadata analysis on vegetarian diets' effect on people at high risk of cardiovascular diseases (CVDs). They found that the vegetarian diet was associated with significantly improved LDL-cho…
